title: Mirai Shounen Conan (Future Boy Conan)
synopsis: Conan was the only child born on Remnant Island, a place settled by a group of refugees while they fled a terrifying wave of magnetic bombs that wiped out most of humanity. After 20 years, most of the castaways have died, save for Conan and the wise old man that raised him.
related_anime: ['Mirai Shounen Conan: Kyodaiki Gigant no Fukkatsu', 'Mirai Shounen Conan (Movie)', 'Mirai Shounen Conan 2: Taiga Daibouken']
